identification.name: BIAS Calibration Software (BICAS)
identification.description: Calibration software meant to be run at LESIA/ROC to (1) calibrate electric field L2 data from electric L1R LFR and TDS-LFM data, and (2) calibrate bias currents from L1R data. Also has additional support for processing L1 (instead of L1R; partial support) to L2, and BIAS L2 to L3 data (both disabled by default).

release.author: Erik P G Johansson, BIAS team, IRF
release.modification: Non-Standard Operations (NSO) table for thruster firings updated for until 2024-08-04; Use bias_rct_validity.json to locate BIAS RCT

modes.name: LFR-SBM1-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SBM1 CWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 CWF science electric selective burst mode 1 data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2 CWF science electric (potential difference) data in selective burst mode 1, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SBM2-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SBM2 CWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 CWF science electric selective burst mode 2 data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2 CWF science electric (potential difference) data in selective burst mode 2, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SURV-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SURV CWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 CWF science electric survey mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2 CWF science electric (potential difference) data in survey mode, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SURV-SWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SURV SWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 SWF science electric survey mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2 SWF science electric (potential difference) data in survey mode, time-tagged

modes.name: TDS-LFM-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate CWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from TDS LF mode L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 CWF science electric LF mode data
out_sci.description: RPW TDS L2 CWF science electric (potential difference) data in LF mode, time-tagged

modes.name: TDS-LFM-RSWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate RSWF electric field L2 data (potential difference) from TDS LF mode L1R data.

out_sci.name: LFR L2 RSWF science electric LF mode data
out_sci.description: RPW TDS L2 RSWF science electric (potential difference) data in LF mode, time-tagged
